questions.question: Two bells ring at intervals of 35 and 42 minutes respectively. The bells ring together at 8.48 a.m. Determine the time when the bells will ring together again.
Complete the figure below to show a rotational symmetry of order 3 about O.
Solve 5/3 -2x <1 – 2/3x ≤ 2 - x. Hence list the integral values that satisfy the inequalities.
The size of two interior angles of an irregular polygon each measures 90°. All the other remaining interior angles each measure 150°. Determine the number of sides of the polygon.

In a race Kipsang maintained an average speed of 5 m/s. When he was 310 m to the finishing line, Mutunga was 50 m behind him. However, Mutunga finished the race 10 m ahead of Kipsang. Determine Mutunga's average speed.

A table is sold at Ksh 4,500 and a chair at Ksh 2,000. A salesman earns a commission of 8% on every table and 5% on every chair sold. On a certain week, he sold 3 more chairs than tables and his total earnings were Ksh 3,980. Determine the number of chairs he sold that week.
A translation T maps A(-6, 2) onto A'(3,5). Determine the translation vector T.

The cost of one litre of Petrol is Ksh 110. John's vehicle covers 12 km on one litre of petrol. He used Ksh 2,805 on petrol to travel from town A to town B. Jane's vehicle consumes 12.5 litres of Petrol for every 100 km travelled. Calculate the amount of money that Jane would use to travel from town A to B on the same road.

Line AB drawn below is a side of a trapezium ABCD. Using a ruler and pair of compasses only, complete trapezium ABCD in which AB is parallel to DC,∠BAD= 67.5°, AD = 5 cm, BC = 5.5 cm and ∠ABC is acute.

Ali left Mombasa for Nairobi on Tuesday at 2.30 a.m. He arrived in Mtito Andei after 3 hours 12 minutes. He stayed in Mtito Andei for 36 hours and then left for Nairobi. He took 5 hours 25 minutes to arrive in Nairobi. Determine the day and time in the 12 hour system Ali arrived in Nairobi.
The height of a cone is 12 cm. A frustrum whose volume is one eighth the volume of the cone is cut off. Determine the height of the frustrum.
A curve is given by y=2x³- 3x² – 12x + 12. Find the gradient function of the curve.
Determine the equation of the normal to the curve at the point (1,-1), in the form y = mx + c, where m and c are constants.
